segments.text: the full figure of the creature becomes visible,
The camera then pans around the creature,
smooth camera movements including dolly out, tracking shots, and crane shots.
combination of close-up, medium, and wide shots

critique:
1. The camera does not zoom out but tilts upward.
2. The full figure of the creature is not visible — only the upper half of its body can be seen at the end.
3. There is no panning around the creature.
4. There is minimal camera movement, limited to an upward tilt.
5. There does not appear to be a wide shot.
